Package SampleCombiDevice

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gmxhome.conrad.jpos.jpos_base.JposBaseDevice
      • de.gmxhome.conrad.jpos.jpos_base.JposDevice
        • SampleCombiDevice.Device
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Device
extends JposDevice
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Implementation of a JposDevice based implementation of a combined driver that becomes several JavaPOS device service in combination with the JposXxxx class in jpos_base

    • Constructor Detail

      • Device

        public Device​(java.lang.String port)
       throws jpos.JposException
        Constructor, Stores communication target. Communication target can be a COM port or a TCP tagret. Valid COM port specifiers differ between operating systems, e.g. on Windows, COM1 can be a valid communication target while on Linux, /dev/ttyS0 might specify the same target. Format of TCP targets is IpAddress:Port, e.g. 10.11.12.13:45678.
        Parameters:
        port - COM port or TCP target.
        Throws:
        jpos.JposException - if Communication target invalid.

      • sendCommand

        protected java.lang.Byte sendCommand​(byte[] request,
                                     byte responseType)
                              throws jpos.JposException
        Method to perform any command
        Parameters:
        request - Data to be sent
        responseType - type of response frame (first byte)
        Returns:
        null on timeout, Byte(responseType) on success
        Throws:
        jpos.JposException - in error case
